original_text: But the men inside reached out and pulled Lot back into the house and shut the door.
korean_text: 그 사람들이 손을 내밀어 롯을 집으로 끌어들이고 문을 닫고

sentences.original_text: But the men inside reached out
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 안에 있던 남자들이 손을 뻗었고

sentences.original_text: and pulled Lot back into the house
